products.title: Nordic Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: The sweet floral illustrations of the nordic in indigo have a contemporary, scandinavian feel to them, and the royal blue background is wonderfully offset by the ice white of the pattern, making for a homely yet modern roman blind. Choose an unusual colour scheme of blue and white for your kitchen, keeping the main items of flooring, walls, tiling, and units in these two colours. Then add an accent colour, perhaps yellow, lime, or orange, to bring the room to life.

products.title: Emi Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.description: To help maximise a smaller space, use soothing pastel shades and attractive prints like the emi mulberry blind. A delicate arrangement of white and mauve inspired flowers sits on a soothing oatmeal base providing a refreshing burst of personality to any room in the home. Choose material in hues that will complement the striking colours of the mulberry, sticking to a comforting palette of dusky pink, mauve, and little bursts of fuschia.

products.title: Heathland Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: Form a distinctive and delicate look with the heathland indigo blind. The graceful, linen-like cloth, with its washed denim finish, forms a casual mood, whereas the charming dove and shrubbery print creates a tasteful style with refined elegance. To generate an attractive and peaceful realm in any room, combine the enchanting print of the indigo with other delicate and attractive patterns in complementing shades of blue and dove grey.

products.title: Faux Suede Purple - Roman Blind
products.description: Create an elegant and regal look with the faux suede in purple, where daring and courageous mauve meets a soothing, velvety cloth to form an eye-catching blind with modish texture, gorgeous colouring, and stacks of style. Match the impressive purple with soft furnishings and fabrics in similar shades of aubergine and damson, creating a continued intense burst of colour full of tempting texture. Incorporate gilded accessories and golden hued oddments to form a more glamorous finish to an imperial look.

products.title: Como Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: When it comes to florals, the como range gets it right. And the indigo offers a deep shade of blue alongside a beautiful blue grey, resulting in a gorgeously moody canvas that combines both the classic and the contemporary. Use the indigo alongside navy blues and creams, in perhaps a main or guest bedroom, where you can complement these lovely florals with plush bedding and ornaments. Add in an accenting shade of yellow for some extra depth, vibrancy, and personality.

products.title: Hathaway Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: The hathaway indigo features an ornate pattern with a traditional vibe, displayed in deep navy indigo and soft cream, making for a striking and attractive roman blind. The 100% cotton fabric sits neatly in roman folds, perfectly suited for its purpose. Blend the indigo with cream walls and gold-toned soft furnishings for a look of real grandeur in your living room. Cream flooring and sofas will provide a fantastic base for gold and navy cushions, throws, and rugs, going for ultimate glamour.

products.title: Guarda Stripe Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: A contemporary blue and grey combo, the guarda stripe in indigo offers roughly painted stripes on a white background, giving an artistic look and feel to this roman blind. The cotton fabric sits neatly into roman folds, and you'll find it simple and easy to use. The indigo would make the ideal addition to a child's or teenager's bedroom, where soft grey walls will provide the perfect base for bolder blue tones in the form of wall art, toys, and ornaments.

products.title: Amelie Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.description: The amelie mulberry completely encompasses true country style. Sat on a bed of grainy oatmeal are blossoming florals in a faded forest green and pretty lilacs and heathers. The rustic aesthetic is neatened somewhat by the structured arches of the roman, creating a sumptuous yet rural theme that will suit any country home. Bring your country kitchen to life by joining the mulberry with the natural weaves of wicker and hessian and accompanying with rustic, unfinished woods.

products.title: Kent Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.description: If one colour spells luxury, it has to be purple. So combined with the plush fabric of the kent collection, the deep berry shade of the mulberry creates a warmth and cosiness that just cannot be matched. Create a homely yet romantic feel in the living room, blending the mulberry with cream walls, dark wooden floorboards, and brushed gold finishings. Keep sofas and chairs in either purple or cream, with cushions in opposing colours, incorporating a pretty pattern if you can.
